root.bootstrap.py: Main CLI entrypoint for running core C.3 and helper tools
root.README.md: Top-level overview of the C.3 Genesis v2 project

core.c3_core.py: Core C.3 orchestrator (ties brains, memory, motivation, tools together)
core.runner.py: Simple CLI runner used by demo_mvp to execute C.3 on a task
core.brain_selector.py: Logic for choosing Architect, Oracle, or both for a request
core.interfaces/brain_interface.py: Shared interface for brain implementations and backends

reasoning.mre.py: Markovian Reasoning Engine (MRE) for chunked context + carry-over summaries
reasoning.reconcile.py: Reconcile layer that merges Architect + Oracle using chemicals/emotions
reasoning.emotions.py: Emotion/chemical model (dopamine, serotonin, cortisol, focus) that modulates temperature and style

curiosity.curiosity.py: Curiosity layer stubs (frontier queue, unknowns wiring)
curiosity.motivation.py: Motivation engine v0.1 that turns chemicals + task into a motivation state

memory.spine.py: Memory Spine v2 (local JSONL store for long-term events and identity)
memory.diff.py: Memory diff tool that compares old vs new memory/event files
memory.events.jsonl: Sample events for testing the spine and diff logic
memory.memory.jsonl: Sample memory data for spine/diff testing
memory.test_events.jsonl: Extra test events for memory diff tool
memory.test_memory.py: Small test harness for the memory spine and diff

narrative.engine.py: Narrative engine v0 stub (chapters and story-of-self hooks)

meta.c3_sim.py: Meta-C.3 stub: simulate C.3 on a task in a sandbox context
meta.c3_sim_cli.py: CLI wrapper to run meta simulations from the command line
meta.cove.py: CoVe / verification budget stubs for meta-verification and safety

forge.forge.py: Forge v1 core: coordinates self-improvement and code suggestions
forge.pr.py: Forge PR helper that proposes small code changes to staged files
forge.staging.json: Staging area metadata for suggested changes from Forge

models.local_backend.py: Backend abstraction for local models (CPU/GPU, provider-agnostic)
models.local_text_model.py: Tiny local text model wrapper used for early offline experiments

tooling.tools.py: Utility helpers shared across tools (logging, basic config, etc.)

tools.__init__.py: Exposes CLI helper tools as a small toolkit package
tools.c3_memory_diff.py: CLI tool: compare two memory/event files and show differences
tools.demo_mvp.py: Main MVP demo script: runs dual-brain + motivation on a sample task
tools.forge_suggest.py: CLI to call Forge and generate a suggested change to reconcile.py
tools.test_motivation.py: Tiny script to exercise the motivation engine and print chemicals

docs.C3_MASTER_HANDOFF.md: High-level architecture, build order, and current state of C.3
docs.C3_FILEMAP.json: Alternate file map in docs (human-readable copy of this handoff map)
docs.C3_CHANGELOG.md: Long-form changelog for docs (mirrors the handoff changelog at a high level)

handoff.C3_MASTER_HANDOFF.md: Primary handoff document new chat windows will read first
handoff.C3_FILEMAP.json: This file: machine-friendly map of important files and their roles
handoff.C3_CHANGELOG.md: Short, focused changelog for repo evolution and window syncing
